title: Frontend Web Developer with React
description:
I was part of multiple teams developing two high-impact internal platforms used daily by thousands of users: one for ticket and incident management, and another for automation creation.
I designed modular interfaces and interactive dashboards, ensuring usability, performance, and scalability.
I implemented complex data flows and dynamic forms with a strong focus on maintainability.
Tech Stack: Typescript, React, Chakra UI, React Hook Form, Orval, Vitest.
